steps.step: You can access lease details in 3 ways, 1. By right clicking on a row, 2. By clicking on a lease number, and 3. By selecting an option in the Lease Information Drop Down List.
Click a hyperlinked lease number in the Lease Number column to access details for that lease.
Lease details are organized in tabs.
Click the tab corresponding to the type of information you want to view.
You can also access lease details by selecting one of the options in the Lease Information Dropdown List located on the right side of the Preview Pane Toolbar.
Click on Reports. Reports is displayed in the Lease Information Dropdown List and a list of hyperlinked reports are listed in the Preview Pane.
To view the selected lease on a map, click on the View Map button located at the top right of the Lease Information window.
